title: The Mutation Of Courtship: From Dating To Swiping Right 1945 - 2021
description:
Why is it so hard to find love today? Are we better off in our relationships than in the recent past? Does having a smartphone give us any real superiority in our human connections? Continuing on with my observations about how society changes, this time I discuss the changes in courtship, romance, love, hooking up, etc. Give ear. Let me know what you think
.......
Oh yeah... I'm on Twitter now. There mostly to contact certain people. Feel free to find me there.https://twitter.com/anadromist
......
Please donate to this channel through PayPal. More than $50 at once or $10 per month will get you ten hours of AUDIO extras from the Anadromist. Click this...  
  https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC
................
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts.   https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne
#love #marriage #history
